channel.title: reflection on Jirong's sandbox
channel.description: Recent content in reflection on Jirong's sandbox

item.title: Highlights of 2020
item.description: Highlights of 2020 Developed forecasting system for hotel room supply and demand for COVID workstream in my previous day job. That’s meaningful! Quit my data scientist job in middle of 2020 to try and pursue a quantitative finance, systematic trading path. Spent the next half of year exploring and building up infrastructure for fully automated algorithmic trading and portfolio management. Deployed 3 trading strategies with 1 currency hedging feature.
